languages.text: "Одинокий калека в Прорве долго не протянет. Я не намерен выкидывать свою жизнь попусту, после того как вы ее спасли, Ваша Светлость. Тут хотя бы меня никто не пытается нанизать на колья или залить кислоту в глотку... пока".

traits.locale_text: "Одинокий калека в Прорве долго не протянет. Я не намерен выкидывать свою жизнь попусту, после того как вы ее спасли, Ваша Светлость. Тут хотя бы меня никто не пытается нанизать на колья или залить кислоту в глотку... пока".
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "A lone cripple won't last long in the Chasm. I don't intend to throw my life away after you have just saved it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. At least here no one is trying to impale me on a stake or pour acid down my throat... yet."
languages.original_text: "Одинокий калека в Прорве долго не протянет. Я не намерен выкидывать свою жизнь попусту, после того как вы ее спасли, Ваша Светлость. Тут хотя бы меня никто не пытается нанизать на колья или залить кислоту в глотку... пока".

traits.locale_text: "A lone cripple won't last long in the Chasm. I do not intend to throw my life away after you just saved it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. At least here no one is trying to impale me on a stake or pour acid into my throat... for now."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "A lone cripple won't last long in the Chasm. I do not intend to throw my life away after you just saved it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. At least here no one is trying to impale me on a stake or pour acid into my throat... for now."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "A lone cripple won't last long in the Chasm. I don't intend to throw my life away after you have just saved it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. At least here no one is trying to impale me on a stake or pour acid down my throat... yet."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "A lone cripple won't last long in the Chasm. I don't intend to throw my life away after you have just saved it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. At least here no one is trying to impale me on a stake or pour acid down my throat... yet."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: 「ひとりの体の不自由な者など、裂け目ではそう長くは持たないでしょう。陛下が救ってくださった命を、すぐさま投げうつ気はありません。少なくともここでは、誰も私を杭に突き刺そうとしたり、喉に酸を流し込もうとしたりなどしてこない…今のところは」
languages.original_text: "A lone cripple won't last long in the Chasm. I don't intend to throw my life away after you have just saved it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. At least here no one is trying to impale me on a stake or pour acid down my throat... yet."

traits.locale_text: 「ひとりの体の不自由な者など、裂け目ではそう長くは持たないでしょう。陛下が救ってくださった命を、すぐさま投げうつ気はありません。少なくともここでは、誰も私を杭に突き刺そうとしたり、喉に酸を流し込もうとしたりなどしてこない…今のところは」
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: “像我这种残废，一个人在裂隙里恐怕撑不了多久。我可不打算您刚救我一命，我就把您的好意浪费掉，大人。至少这里没人打算把我钉在木桩上，或者往我喉咙里倒酸液……至少现在还没有。”
languages.original_text: "A lone cripple won't last long in the Chasm. I don't intend to throw my life away after you have just saved it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. At least here no one is trying to impale me on a stake or pour acid down my throat... yet."

traits.locale_text: “像我这种残废，一个人在裂隙里恐怕撑不了多久。我可不打算您刚救我一命，我就把您的好意浪费掉，大人。至少这里没人打算把我钉在木桩上，或者往我喉咙里倒酸液……至少现在还没有。”
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: «Un lisiado solitario no durará mucho en el Abismo. No pienso desperdiciar mi vida después de que usted me la haya salvado. Al menos aquí nadie intenta empalarme en una estaca o verter ácido en mi garganta... de momento».
languages.original_text: "A lone cripple won't last long in the Chasm. I don't intend to throw my life away after you have just saved it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. At least here no one is trying to impale me on a stake or pour acid down my throat... yet."

traits.locale_text: «Un lisiado solitario no durará mucho en el Abismo. No pienso desperdiciar mi vida después de que usted me la haya salvado. Al menos aquí nadie intenta empalarme en una estaca o verter ácido en mi garganta... por ahora».
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Ein einsamer Krüppel wird in der Kluft nicht lange überleben. Ich habe nicht vor, mein Leben wegzuwerfen, nachdem Ihr es gerade erst gerettet habt, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Hier versucht zumindest niemand, mich zu pfählen oder mir Säure in meinen Rachen zu schütten ... bis jetzt."
languages.original_text: "A lone cripple won't last long in the Chasm. I don't intend to throw my life away after you have just saved it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. At least here no one is trying to impale me on a stake or pour acid down my throat... yet."

traits.locale_text: "Ein einsamer Krüppel wird in der Kluft nicht lange überleben. Ich habe nicht vor, mein Leben wegzuwerfen, nachdem Ihr es gerade erst gerettet habt, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Hier versucht zumindest niemand, mich zu pfählen oder mir Säure in den Rachen zu schütten ... noch nicht."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: « Un infirme ne fera pas long feu dans l'Abîme, surtout s'il est seul. Je n'ai absolument pas l'intention de jouer avec ma vie maintenant que vous l'avez sauvée, Votre Seigneurie. Ici au moins, personne n'essaie de m'empaler sur une pique ou de me verser de l'acide dans la gorge... du moins, pour l'instant. »
languages.original_text: "A lone cripple won't last long in the Chasm. I don't intend to throw my life away after you have just saved it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. At least here no one is trying to impale me on a stake or pour acid down my throat... yet."

traits.locale_text: « Un infirme ne fera pas long feu dans l'Abîme, surtout s'il est seul. Je n'ai absolument pas l'intention de jouer avec ma vie maintenant que vous l'avez sauvée, Votre Seigneurie. Au moins, ici, personne n'essaie de m'empaler sur une pique ou de me verser de l'acide dans la gorge... enfin, pour l'instant. »
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Yalnız dolaşan topalın teki, Yarık'ta çok dayanmaz. Daha yeni kurtardığınız hayatımı öyle hemen çöpe atamam {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. En azından burada beni kazığa oturtmaya ya da boğazımdan aşağıya asit dökmeye kalkan yok. Henüz..."
languages.original_text: "A lone cripple won't last long in the Chasm. I don't intend to throw my life away after you have just saved it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. At least here no one is trying to impale me on a stake or pour acid down my throat... yet."

traits.locale_text: "Yalnız dolaşan topalın teki, Yarık'ta çok uzun süre dayanmaz. Daha yeni kurtardığınız hayatımı öyle hemen çöpe atamam {mf|Lord|Leydi Hazretleri}. En azından burada kimse beni kazığa oturtmaya ya da boğazımdan asit dökmeye kalkmıyor. Henüz..."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis
